short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A versatile Chrome extension with features like case conversion, Base64 text encoding/decoding, JSON beautification, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MultiTool is a versatile application that provides several useful features to simplify your tasks. With Multi Tool, you can easily encode and decode Base64 text, validate JSON, convert text case, beautify JSON, trim strings, format colors, and even encode images to Base64.

Following are the features this extension provides:

1. Case convertor
2. Base64 Text Encoder/Decoder
3. Text Editor
4. Json Beautifier
5. Paragraph to JSON
6. Color Formatter
7. Image Formatter (Base 64 Image Encoder/Decoder)
8. Epoch Time Formatter
9. Cron Expression
10. YAML to JSON
11. JSON to YAML
